DIA_Proximo_FinishTournament_13_02: Dear viewers, we have a new arena champion!
DIA_Proximo_FinishTournament_13_03: Against all expectations, Marvin wins the final battle!
DIA_Proximo_FinishTournament_13_04: After many months without a single defeat, the mighty Ben has been laid to rest by our guest from the city of Archolos!
DIA_Proximo_FinishTournament_13_05: Now that the lust for bloodshed has been satisfied, I invite all to move to the inn. Let us quench our remaining thirst with fine wine at Cortez' expense!
DIA_Proximo_FinishTournament_13_06: Before you get drunk like molerats, don't forget to drink at least one round in honor of our new champion!
